simplified: 男怕入错行，女怕嫁错郎

pronunciation.pinyin: nán pà rù cuò háng , nu:3 pà jià cuò láng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: nan2 pa4 ru4 cuo4 hang2 , nu:3 pa4 jia4 cuo4 lang2

details.simplified: 男怕入错行，女怕嫁错郎
details.traditional: 男怕入錯行，女怕嫁錯郎

meanings.value: men fear getting into the wrong line of business, women fear marrying the wrong man (proverb)
